Definition: The unique combination of site and plot for the corresponding richness, used as a random effect in the analysis
Broader location where the data collection occurred within  Panther Swamp National Wildlife Refuge, Yazoo, Mississippi, USA
Independent plot location names within each site. All the plots were composed of old-growth, bottomland hardwood forests with similar canopy covers
Month of deployment (August, September, or November)
Camera trap design (V = Vertical, H = Horizontal)
The number of unique wildlife species detected at the given site and plot
